snippet.title: Kill It With Fire VR | Official Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Prepare for the most immersive spider-killing experience ever devised: Kill It With Fire VR is AVAILABLE NOW!

Equipped with an (almost) unlimited arsenal of weapons and equipment, your job is to hunt and destroy every last arachnid. With eight distinct spider species to fight and dozens of optional objectives, you'll never run out of challenges in this game. And if you're feeling adventurous, take on the Arachno-Gauntlet, a challenge that will put your spider-slaying skills to the test. 

With a realistic fire simulation system and gratuitous chaos and destruction, Kill It With Fire VR  is sure to be the most trusted method of fighting your arachnophobia!
